org.ofbiz.commonapp.security.login
Class UserLoginHelper

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.ofbiz.commonapp.security.login.UserLoginHelper
public class UserLoginHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Title: User Login Entity

Description: None

The Helper class from the UserLogin Entity EJB; acts as a proxy for the Home interface
